Front-End Developer

Victor Stasiuk

I'm a former public servant and advertising manager. You should hire me for the position. You say that I haven't enough experience and knowledge in IT. You are right. But I'll tell you 3 main reasons to hire me: 1.  I have a great desire to learn, high motivation and a crazy dream to work in IT one day. And to do this I will start many courses, such as Work In Tech by Google.com and Coursera, English courses and some others. Part of them I finished, at others I will still learn. 2. I'm switcher. Course the war in Ukraine I lost my job in the public service after 22 years of experience in it. But I get rich experience of leadership for 19 years in the local executive body, which you should never get anywhere. Many courses I have learn while I was working to NGO, in particular on the topic of leadership, e-society, e-governance. 3. My best skills are hardworking and analytical abilities , responsibility, problem solving and multitasking. I have much more of them you could see on resume sidebar. However, I love coding and learn it on courses much more right now. So, I believe could be heavy beneficial to your company. Thank you for reading my resume.
